title: Integrated Action Observation and Motor Imagery (AOMI) Training Program for Motor Skill Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic exercise techniques and experience with fundamental simulations
context.additional_context: Convergent education program exploring the relationship between mathematical modeling and motor skills

learning_goals: Learners can accurately identify and explain core movement elements of motor skills with over 80% accuracy using the AOMI technique.
Learners can improve motor skill performance accuracy by 20% through AOMI training based on self- or other-modeling.
Learners can analyze the motor learning mechanisms of AOMI training through mathematical modeling via project-based assessment.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
